remarks: Write out the top and bottom parts of the binomial coefficient ` ( N _C K ) = ( N x. ( N - 1 ) x. ... x. ( ( N - K ) + 1 ) ) / K ! ` explicitly.  In this form, it is valid even for ` N < K ` , although it is no longer valid for nonpositive ` K ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-May-2014.)
